jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Aligning Driver Engagement nationwide strategy to achieve targeted % of engaged drivers 
● Responsible to design, deploy and manage nationwide Driver Engagement programs and initiatives 
● Supervise and align Driver Engagement's *content management* with relevant internal stakeholders on any driver facing information, including but not limited to policy, rules, regulation and driver application update 
● Design, update and manage Driver Engagement Handbook as execution reference for every Region Ops team for Driver Engagement ● Responsible for nationwide driver community management and related stakeholder engagement 
● Collaborate with City tech Business and Product team in developing solution for scalable and accountable nationwide Driver ● Engagement Operation 
● Supervise execution of driver based research studies to better understand our drivers 
● Manage and develop Driver Engagement team

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
